sn2.19:4.2: Standing to one side, the god Uttara recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
sn2.19:5.1: “This life, so very short, is led onward.
sn2.19:5.2: There’s no shelter for someone who’s been led on by old age.
sn2.19:5.4: you should do good deeds that bring happiness.”
sn2.19:6.1: “This life, so very short, is led onward.
sn2.19:6.2: There’s no shelter for someone who’s been led on by old age.
sn2.19:6.4: one looking for peace would drop the world’s bait.”
